A turkey rub to use during the holidays. Adapted from a [Food Network Recipe](http://www.foodnetwork.com/recipes/patrick-and-gina-neely/thanksgiving-turkey-with-holiday-rub-recipe/index.html)

## Ingredients

-   2 teaspoons kosher salt
-   1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
-   2 teaspoons dried thyme
-   2 teaspoons dried rosemary
-   1 teaspoon dried sage
-   1/2 teaspoon garlic powder

## Directions

1.  Mix spices together in small bowl.
2.  Generously season the turkey cavity with salt and pepper, to taste. Brush the turkey with olive oil, and rub it with the seasoning mixture.
